description:
The last real six Funeral Wreath, Ghost, finally arrives when things are most intense. His body is twice the size of a normal person, and it radiates light as though it is electrically charged. He also looks identical to Byakuran. Everyone is astonished by the sight of this unexpected last Funeral Wreath, and even Kikyo seems rattled. Gokudera, Basil, and Ryohei launch a preemptive strike with an attack that combines all of their Box Weapons!
Source: crunchyroll
